bibl.title: Beginning of a letter of the acting prefect Mussius Aemilianus
bibl.note: P. Coll. privées: ex P. Wellburn sans No. d'Inv. [presently privately owned in Wilrijk, Belgium]. Letter directed to a certain Dius, a prytanis or president of the town council of Arsinoe. Written in Alexandria, found in Arsinoe. Dated ca. 255-259 CE. - Pp. 122-125: Appendix: Lucius Mussius Aemilianus in the Papyri.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Coll. privées: ex P. Wellburn sans No. d'Inv.
Francisca Hoogendijk, Beginning of a Letter of the Acting Prefect Mussius Aemilianus.

P. Coll. privées: ex P. Wellburn sans No. d'Inv. [presently privately owned in Wilrijk, Belgium]. Letter directed to a certain Dius, a prytanis or president of the town council of Arsinoe. Written in Alexandria, found in Arsinoe. Dated ca. 255-259 CE. - Pp. 122-125: Appendix: Lucius Mussius Aemilianus in the Papyri.
